sentences.en: I locked the bike in the forecourt of the Kirey Hotel.

sentences.en: In another hospital, I found a gaggle of rural patients crouching on the forecourt.
sentences.cn: 在另一家医院, 我一群吵闹的农村病人蹲在医院的大厅.

sentences.en: The forecourt was crawling with security men.

sentences.en: The landscape developed by Kew Gardens forms part of the Australia season on the museum's forecourt, and includes rare and unique plants from across the country.
sentences.cn: 这一由邱园设计的景观构成了博物馆前院澳大利亚季节景致的一部分，其中包括了澳大利亚全境稀有独特的植物。
